name: Power Trip
description: You boast your strength and attack a target. Make a melee attack, doing 1d4 + MOVE dark damage on a hit. For each unique stat change affecting the user, add an additional damage dice.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 1d10 at level 17.
